name: Metreecs
headline: AI-powered demand forecasting for retail
description: Metreecs helps retailers plan, buy, and allocate products using AI-demand forecasting. We prevent overstock and out-of-stock situations, allowing clients to eliminate waste, free up capital, and drive higher sales.

founders.name: Martin Dimitrov, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and COO of Metreecs. Previously led the international expansion of Lydia in Italy, before moving into early stage venture capital where I invested in AI and B2B SaaS startups.

founders.name: Elie Dufeu, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CTO of Metreecs. Previously graduated from École Polytechnique in Applied Mathematics and Columbia in Data Science, and developed forecasting models for financial institutions.

founders.name: Thibaut Pellegrin, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO of Metreecs. Previously co-founded a leather bag company before moving to consulting and growth equity specialised in B2B SaaS.

generated_description:
**Metreecs: Revolutionizing Retail with AI Demand Forecasting**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch F24, Metreecs offers a cutting-edge solution for retail inventory management, leveraging the power of artificial intelligence. Their mission is straightforward yet impactful: to optimize demand forecasting for retailers, enabling them to buy, allocate, and plan their products more efficiently.

**How It Works:**
Metreecs employs AI-driven demand forecasting to tackle two critical retail challenges—overstock and out-of-stock situations. By providing actionable insights, the platform helps retailers streamline inventory decisions, reducing waste, freeing up capital, and ultimately enhancing sales performance. This means customers can restock before products sell out while minimizing excess inventory. As a result, they can expect an impressive increase in sell-through rates by up to 20%, capture more sales opportunities leading to a 35% growth in revenue, and achieve remarkable ROI, sometimes up to 10x.

**Current Operations:**
Despite being a small team with just three employees, Metreecs has positioned itself as a vital partner for retailers looking to revolutionize their inventory strategies. The company is based in Tigery, France, with Nicolas Dessaigne as the Group Partner steering their strategic vision. 

Their platform offers a robust suite of features designed to optimize product management, such as:
- **Rebalance**: Automated suggestions to allocate inventory effectively.
- **Reorder**: Predicting top-performing products to prevent stock outages.
- **Buy**: Facilitating purchasing decisions based on data-driven insights.
- **Analyze**: Tracking product performance across various sales channels.

**Why It Matters:**
With the retail landscape becoming increasingly competitive, Metreecs champions the idea that intelligent inventory decisions can differentiate successful retailers from those struggling to keep up. Their approach not only mitigates risks associated with stock management but also empowers retailers to respond dynamically to market changes.

For more information, to get a demo, or calculate your potential impact, check out their website at [Metreecs](https://www.metreecs.com).
